FAIL_TO_PASS: when implicit help option then help option not affected
when showGlobalOptions:true and nested commands then combined nested options shown program last
when program has command then appears in help
when program has command with optional arg then appears in help
when argument described then included in helpInformation
when add two options with helpGroup then help contains group
when argument described with default then included in helpInformation
when add two commands with helpGroup then help contains group
when set sortOptions then options are sorted within groups
when .helpCommand(name) then help command in group
when add two options then help contains group with two options
when .helpCommand(true) then help command in group
when arguments described in deprecated way and empty description then arguments still included in helpInformation
when add options with different groups then help contains two groups
when showGlobalOptions:true and sortOptions: true then global options sorted
when command with custom helpGroup then helpGroup wins
when add two commands then help contains group with two commands
end-to-end: when option description is preformatted then manual format is preserved
when option with helpGroup then helpGroup wins
when .version(str) then version option in group
